thread.title: Really good hotel- highly recommended!
thread.title_full: Really good hotel- highly recommended! - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SafJuanito
title: Really good hotel- highly recommended!
text:
HIE London Victoria is a really good hotel, with clean rooms, good facilities, great location and helpful staff.
The hotel is easily accessible, and between the Victoria and Pimlico tube stations. Parking is somewhat of a premium... which is normal for central london [sadly!]
Breakfast is also included and good quality.
Highly recommended!
